summary: Functional test module that validates the behavior of Conan's new local recipe index, providing helper utilities to check repository entries and emulate missing items, and a test suite that exercises indexing, searching, and error handling of local package recipes.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the local recipe indexing feature in the Conan package manager, preventing regressions and ensuring developers can reliably locate and manage local package recipes.
